description: Get suggestions for summertime fun activities.  When you are at the beach or the lake or the mountains, activities are suggested.  You can ask what to do in the city or the country. You can ask what to eat or drink and get recipes for how to make those summer treats. If an activity suggestion mentions making something or using something, you can ask how to make it or how to do use it.
exampleInteractions: what can i do at the beach
how do i make homemade ice cream
name: Summer Fun
shortDescription: get activities for summertime fun. get recipes for summer treats.
